name: Parcel Perform Pte Ltd
description: Developer of a carrier-independent delivery management platform designed to improve the e-commerce customer checkout experience. The company's logistics management platform is an easy-to-use self-service tracking dashboard and also provides a B2C-based free tracking service for end-consumers, enabling merchants to track their global and local carriers and offering them the opportunity to send shoppers continuous updates about the status of their shipments in real time.
one_liner: Developer of a carrier-independent delivery management platform designed to improve the e-commerce customer checkout experience. The company's logistics management platform is an easy-to-use self-service tracking dashboard and also provides a B2C-based free tracking service for end-consumers, enabling merchants to track their global and local carriers and offering them the opportunity to send shoppers continuous updates about the status of their shipments in real time.
